pr_title: [FLINK-19295][yarn][tests] Exclude more meaningless akka shutdown errors

timeline.message: [FLINK-19295][yarn][tests] Exclude more meaningless akka shutdown errors

timeline.bodyText: I'm wondering whether we should rework this to work on Patterns instead; then we could also include akka.remote.ReliableDeliverySupervisor, or in fact the entire message.
timeline.author: zentol
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -128,10 +128,11 @@
 		// workaround for annoying InterruptedException logging:
 		// https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/YARN-1022
 		"java.lang.InterruptedException",
-		// very specific on purpose
+		// very specific on purpose; whitelist meaningless exceptions that occur during akka shutdown:
 		"Remote connection to [null] failed with java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused",
 		"Remote connection to [null] failed with java.nio.channels.NotYetConnectedException",
 		"java.io.IOException: Connection reset by peer",
+		"Caused by: [java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused:",

timeline.bodyText: nit: In practice \\. is probably not necessary here; chances are slim that another message would manage to match the pattern. You could also pass the LITERAL flag for all but the akka message.
timeline.author: zentol
